intro: Every street holds danger, fortune, and opportunity.
description:
Vice Thief Simulator: 80s Nostalgia throws you straight into the vibrant streets of the 1980s, where you play as a cunning thief determined to get rich at any cost. Break into doors, steal valuable items, take on car theft contracts, and stay one step ahead of the police. Upgrade your skills and gear to tackle increasingly secure locks and tougher security. Caution and the ability to distract law enforcement are the keys to survival in a world where every mistake could cost you your freedom.
Features:
- 80s Atmosphere – Neon-lit streets, booming pop hits, and a city alive with disco and crime.
- Lockpicking System – Tackle locks of varying difficulty; better tools and skill are needed for high-value targets.
- Car Theft & Delivery – Steal cars, evade the police, and deliver them for rewards.
- Pawn Shop – Turn stolen items into cash, from jewelry to electronics.
- Distract the Cops – Create diversions to keep law enforcement off your trail.
- Chases – Run, hide, and escape through streets and alleys if the cops spot you.
Step into the adrenaline-fueled world of Vice Thief Simulator: 80s Nostalgia and prove your skills in the ultimate test of stealth, speed, and cunning. Will you rise to become the most notorious thief of the decade, or will the city’s relentless law enforcement finally catch up to you?
